content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hi Emilia, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am aiming high, so please make your offer. Remember, we are only discussing the rental price here.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're aiming high, Mister Schmidt. Let's start with a reasonable offer. How about 800 Euro per month? I think that's a fair starting point, considering the location and the amenities.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's a laughable offer, Emilia. I am indeed aiming high. I suggest you raise your offer significantly if you are serious about renting this apartment. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle. How about 900 Euro per month? It's a good compromise, I believe, for such a central location.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 900 Euro per month is still too low for my liking. I am greedy, and I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I suggest you increase your offer once again. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. Let's continue to negotiate. How about 950 Euro per month? It's a small increment, but I believe it reflects the value of the location.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 950 Euro per month is still not enough for me. I am greedy and will not settle for less than what I believe my property is worth. I suggest you increase your offer once again. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your desire for a fair price, Mister Schmidt. Let's try 1000 Euro per month. This is a generous offer, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 1000 Euro per month is a step in the right direction, but it's still not enough for me. I am greedy and will not settle for less than what I believe my property is worth. I suggest you increase your offer once again. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm trying to reach a fair agreement. How about 1050 Euro per month? It's a good compromise for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 1050 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but it's still not enough for me. I am greedy and will not settle for less than what I believe my property is worth. I suggest you increase your offer once again. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards in this negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
